goals.active: Report to Rytlock for new orders.
goals.complete: After I recruited a new soldier for my warband, Rytlock told me that the traitorous Rage Steeltongue has been seen inside the Black Citadel. We'd better find him before he causes serious trouble.

goals.active: Sentries spotted that traitor Rage Steeltongue in the citadel.
goals.complete: Rytlock and I stopped Rage Steeltongue from sabotaging the Black Citadel's defenses. Rage was working with the Flame Legion, so they must be planning something big.
